1137.quoteText:
We automatically collect some technical information from these devices and web browsers even when you're not signed in to a BBC account. This might include:

  • IP (internet protocol) address
  • device ID
  • app ID
  • vendor ID
1137.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
tosdr.tldr: "We collect some data automatically - Like [...] what browser and device you’re using."

1419.title: BBC may collect your device fingerprint.

tosdr.tldr: "We collect some data automatically - Like [...] what browser and device you’re using."

1515.quoteText:
Personalisation is turned on in your account settings.

If you don't want to receive personalised services you can turn this option off.
1515.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

tosdr.case: You can opt out of targeted advertising
